artist: Artist: Trevor Alixopulos; Publisher: Braino Comix, Fulton, Calif.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of two figures kissing with text and designs printed in offset lithography on blush-like wove paper covers; 16 pp.
inscription: Front cover, black ink marker: Hey Fly ~ Alixopulos
signed: Front cover, black ink marker: Alixopulos
title: Nil, no. 4
